events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentioned a refund request, so the issue is categorized under Refund for proper handling.
The refund request case was assigned to agent Sarah Thompson for follow-up and resolution.
Hello! I'm Sarah, here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and details about the issue?
To process the refund efficiently, could you confirm whether the product was unopened or used, and the reason for the refund?
The item was opened but unused. It was the wrong model shipped to me, so I want a full refund or an exchange for the correct model.
We can offer a full refund once we receive the returned product. I will send you a prepaid return label and instructions to complete the process.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate receiving the prepaid label and will send the product back by tomorrow.
We have received your returned item and processed the full refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to help improve our service. We would appreciate your feedback.
